textBeforeTable: 10:00 a.m. SUNDAY SCHOOL » « February 5, 2012 DAYSPRING MENNONITE CHURCH ORDER OF SERVICE February 5, 2012 Weekly Bulletin » Home » Listen to Dayspring Sermons WEEKLY BULLETIN LOCATION | MINISTRIES | PASTOR | SERMONS | SERVICES | ABOUT US | HOME | Through the tender mercy of our God; whereby the Dayspring from on high hath visited us, To give light to them that sit in darkness and in the shadow of death, To guide our feet into the way of peace. (Luke 1:78-79)
textAfterTable: WORSHIP 11:00 a.m. Praise, Worship & Sharing:   Praise & Worship Team Announcements:   Merv Stoltzfus Sermon:   Old Command, New Command (I John 2:7-14), by Pastor Bob Yoder UPCOMING EVENTS Sun. Feb. 5 — Joel & Patty will be sharing about their trip to India and the Good Life ministry through slides and videos. The service time has been changed from 7:00 PM to 6:00 PM. Mon. Feb. 6 — The Kingdom Seekers cell group will meet at the church at 7:30 PM. Wed. Feb. 8 — The Youth Group Bible study will be held at the church at 7:30 PM. Thur. Feb. 9 — The Good Samaritans cell group will meet at Tom & Bo Bruccoleri's home at 6:30 PM. Thur. Feb. 9 — The Intercessors cell group will meet at Tom & Elsie Reese's home at 7:30 PM. Feb. 19-24 — Revival meetings. John Yoder from Goshan Indiana will be our speaker this year. The services begin on Sunday morning, Feb. 19th and end on Friday evening, Feb. 24th. Please keep these meetings in your prayers. LAST SUNDAY: Attendance:   128 ; 10 were visitors.
